attributes.action: Deport illegal immigrant prisoners held in UK for crimes commited in UK without payment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a pathetic situation when illegal immigrants into UK who then offend against the British public are paid a sum of money to return to their country of origin.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/foreigndeports/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
